long_description: Great for the minimalist rider, the Topeak Mini 6 multitool offers 6 basic tools in a compact and easily stowed design. Tools include 2, 3, 4, 5, 6mm Allen wrenches and a #2 Phillips screwdriver; tools are made from hardened steel for lasting use. Tough extruded aluminum multitool body is lengthened to offer increased leverage.
short_description: Great for the minimalist rider, the Topeak Mini 6 multitool offers 6 basic tools in a compact and easily stowed design.
